Classname
=========

``from decpys.package import Classname``

See the `official Qt documentation <https://doc.qt.io/path/to/Qt/docs>`_
for the functionality this class wraps.

Convenience functions
---------------------

``from decpys.package import convFunc``

Use these convenience functions when you need to construct Classname within your UI.


Methods
-------

.. py:class:: Classname(self)


.. py:method:: Classname.methodname()
